item.title: [Project Insanity] making d claws spec work
item.dc:creator: @taintedhappy taintedhappy
item.description:
@taintedhappy wrote:

iv got it all in the claws are in the game with the spec bar on i think i have the right code to make them work but they dont like i click spec and and it doesnt hit the NPC it just turns spec off and hits it and is there a spot in PI that you need to make it so it hits players also cuz thats how it is in delta you need a code in NPC and on players. im not sure if its the right code or even if i put them in the right spot i put the code in src/server/model/players/packets/clickingbuttons

the code is:

case 14484: setAnimation(6000); dclaws = 3; checkclaws(); specialAmount -= 50; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false; usingSpecial = true; break;

Read full topic
